title: Work Timer
description: Simple pomodoro cycle timer. Start your work cycle, it lets you know when to rest and start working again.- Configurable Work & Rest PeriodsYou can set your work and rest timeframe and start your timer.- Auto ContinueYou can automatically continue to next phase; this will allow you to work and rest continuously.- Android Wear SupportedIt buzzes your watch with different work and rest vibration patterns.
descriptionHTML:
Simple pomodoro cycle timer. Start your work cycle, it lets you know when to rest and start working again.

- Configurable Work & Rest Periods
You can set your work and rest timeframe and start your timer.

- Auto Continue
You can automatically continue to next phase; this will allow you to work and rest continuously.

- Android Wear Supported
It buzzes your watch with different work and rest vibration patterns.
comments: Decent app! The app is pretty decent. But, there is no sound notification when a Pomodoro ends. Just the vibrations are not enough. Plus, you can do one more thing, you can add some motivational content like quotes,etc. in the app to make it better
